thread.title: Lovely stay in Hotel that delivered what I requested
thread.title_full: Lovely stay in Hotel that delivered what I requested - Review of The Nadler Soho, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: alantubby
title: Lovely stay in Hotel that delivered what I requested
text:
I asked for a quiet room and after contacting Mateo reception manager by email he offered me a quiet room in the hotel and yes they delivered. We had 3 nights there 14 to 17 March with my wife and it was 3 nights perfect quiet sleep which is just what you need after a hard day and night visiting various locations in the capital and often don't get at other hotels in the center. They even remembered it was a treat for my wife and sent a card and a small bottle of fizz. Thank you and all your staff, we will see you again later in the year.
Room Tip: Just ask for one away from Carlisle street. See more room tips
